original_text: And sent messengers before his face: and they went, and entered into a village of the Samaritans, to make ready for him.
korean_text: 사자들을 앞서 보내시매 그들이 가서 예수를 위하여 준비하려고 사마리아인의 한 마을에 들어갔더니

sentences.original_text: And sent messengers before his face
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 얼굴 앞으로 사자들을 보냈으며

sentences.original_text: and entered into a village of the Samaritans
